name: Damaaz the Barbarian Warlock
description:
Kill to kill more!

After the mad Wizard Kings destroy Damaaz’s whole tribe with demonic magicks, the barbarian warlock is set on a path of revenge, bloody mayhem and destruction.

Damaaz The Barbarian Warlock is a single player fast-paced Beat 'em Up action game with unique, comic style line art. Inspired by Sword and Sorcery, plunge into the dark fantasy world of Damaaz the Barbarian Warlock.

The game was produced by students of University of Applied Sciences Jamk during the fall semester 2023

Features:


As Damaaz the Barbarian Warlock you hack and slash your way through countless enemies on your quest.
  • Combo attacks with the use of Light and Heavy attacks.
  • Dash and run to avoid danger.
  • Power bar combining both player health and skill stamina bar.
  • Multiple enemy types to challenge your skills.
  • Boss battle to overcome.
  • Dynamic sounds utilizing Wwise.
  • Original soundtrack.
  • Original hand drawn comic style art and animations.
